subject: Shipping #SSN4350
description_text:
Hello!
I'm back regarding order #SSN4350.
Today is December 24th – more than 20 days have passed since I placed the
order. You told me you'd ship the package after the 20th, but I still
haven't seen any progress.

conversations.body_text: Hi Сергей Р,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our logistics channel to Moldova is currently closed due to excessive volume. At this time, shipments can only be sent via UPS at a cost of 945 RMB (approximately $134 USD). We require you to cover the $57 USD difference to cover our costs for processing your order. Alternatively, we can hold your shipment until the original logistics channel reopens, which is expected around the 20th. We sincerely apologize for the delay.

I can wait.
Only if it doesn't drag on for a certain period.
 It's best to notify the buyer about such matters BEFORE they place their
order.

пт, 12 дек. 2025 г., 13:09 service@simsonn.com
Hi Сергей Р,    I apologize for not informing you in a timely manner. Thank you for your response.
ID 号为 7850 和 8062 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8062  
      主题: Shipping  
      描述:  Hello.   I placed an order on your website on December 3rd (Order #SSN4350).   Today is December 12th, and I still haven't received a tracking number—apparently the order hasn't shipped. 
  I've already contacted your support team, but haven't received a response.  
  What's the problem, and how long will I have to wait for my order?

Hi Сергей Р,    We apologize for the delay in processing your order. We will ship it via UPS. You can click this link to pay the shipping fee. Sorry for the inconvenience!  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Hello.
So, instead of offering a constructive solution, you're simply forcing me
to pay for expensive shipping again?
When I placed my order, I selected economy shipping and paid for it.
Bravo! Excellent customer service and promotion of your brand!
If you can't provide delivery under the original terms, I demand a full
refund.

сб, 27 дек. 2025 г. в 13:57, service@simsonn.com

Hi Сергей Р,    We apologize for the delayed response. As we've just launched sales in Moldova and lack logistics experience there, the shipping costs are prohibitively high. We will cancel your order and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Hi.
Okay, I hope I don't have to wait another two months for my refund?

чт, 15 янв. 2026 г. в 13:11, service@simsonn.com
